concept.title: Drop-C Tuning
concept.shortdesc: Drop-C tuning involves tuning the low E string (E2, string six) and high E string (E4, string one) two whole tones lower to low C (C2) and high C (C4) respectively. This allows easier playing of specific chords.

conbody.p: The notes in Drop-D tuning from sting six to sting one are C, A, D, G, B, and C respectively. Specifically the notes are C2, A2, D3, G3, B3, C4. You will notice that only the high and low E's change pitch compared to standard tuning.
